title: Dex: Incremental Learning for Complex Environments in Deep Reinforcement Learning
summary: This paper introduces Dex, a reinforcement learning environment toolkit special- Complex environments such as Go, Starcraft, and many modern video-games present profound challenges in deep reinforcement learning that have yet to be solved. They often require long, precisesequences of actions and domain knowledge in order to obtain reward. Solutions to these problems would mark a signiﬁcant breakthrough on the path to general intelligence. As environments become more complex, they will become more expensive to simulate.
key_insights: In this paper we introduce Dex, the ﬁrst continual reinforcement learning toolkit for training and evaluating continual learning methods.
This paper introduced the continual learning toolkit Dex for training and evaluation of continual learning methods.
This paper introduced the continual learning toolkit Dex for training and evaluation of continual learning methods.
